title: Stephen Chow NFTs eclipse 10K ETH in trading volume as community expands
description:
"Nobody" NFTs are currently the top trending collection on OpenSea on the day of publication.

Hong Kong director Stephen Chow, known for the iconic film Kung Fu Hustle, launched a profile picture nonfungible token (NFT) collection titled "Nobody" earlier this month. At the time of publication, the collection has witnessed over 9,695 Ether ($23 million) traded with a daily volume of 2,713 Ether (ETH). 

The same day, Chow changed his profile picture on X and Instagram to a Nobody Avatar, writing: "Any good ideas for [Nobody] community events? I'm new here, so I hope you guys can give me some advice!" The director also encouraged his followers to change their profile pictures to that of Nobody. For future plans regarding the Nobody collection, developers wrote:

On Jan. 10, Chow partnered with cryptocurrency exchange OKX for the creation of a Nobody NFT whitelist giveaway. Over 125,000 users participated in the airdrop with 2,500 Nobody NFTs up for grabs. The total supply of Nobodys is capped at 10,000.

Read more

title: Bitcoin has ‘10 days max’ until BTC price metric hits squeeze zone
description:
Bitcoin volatility monitoring is calling for a dramatic upending of flat BTC price action within the coming days.

Bitcoin (BTC) has no more than 10 days before fresh BTC price volatility hits, new analysis concludes.

In a post on X (formerly Twitter) on Feb. 7, popular social media trader HornHairs flagged a rare signal involving the Bollinger Bands volatility indicator.

Bitcoin may have traded within a compact intraday range for over 150 days, but a new chart signal suggests that change is afoot.

Read more

title: Amazon Slashes Price on MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 OC Graphics Card
description: In a bid to cater to the burgeoning demand for high-performance graphics cards among gamers and creative professionals, Amazon has rolled out an enticing deal on the MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4070 OC Graphics Card. title: PayPal’s PYUSD Stablecoin Gains Chainlink Price Feed Support
description:
This integration is a significant milestone. Using Chainlink’s Oracle network, it offers precise, reliable, and decentralized PYUSD market data on the blockchain. The availability of this data is crucial, offering the insights needed to foster secure markets for PYUSD. Also, it encourages its adoption as the preferred stablecoin for facilitating on-chain payments. Enhancing PYUSD Market […]

The post PayPal’s PYUSD Stablecoin Gains Chainlink Price Feed Support appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Pro-XRP Lawyer Defends Crypto Giants Amid Legislative Push
description:
The European Union’s proactive stance on crypto regulation signals a commitment to stringent standards for foreign firms. Recent rulings and developments bolster the non-security status of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP, challenging the SEC’s stance. Pro-XRP lawyer John E. Deaton shields major cryptos amid regulatory pushback, highlighting Bitcoin and Ethereum’s successes. After increased demands for cryptocurrency […]

The post Pro-XRP Lawyer Defends Crypto Giants Amid Legislative Push appeared first on Coin Edition.
